t: Champion Elite 225 Engine Driven Welder - Amazon.com
s: Combining a 225-amp DC welder with an 11,000-watt generator, the Champion Elite 225 is ideal for farm, general construction, and emergency power applications. Designed for stick welding with quick and easy arc starts, it also performs general scratch-start DC TIG.
